verses.text: And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* it from \w Eben-ezer|strong="H0072"\w* unto \w Ashdod|strong="H0795"\w*.

When the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* it into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w*, and \w set|strong="H3322"\w* it \w by|strong="H0681"\w* \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w*.

¶ And when they of \w Ashdod|strong="H0796"\w* arose \w early|strong="H7925"\w* on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*, behold, \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w* \add was\add* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* upon his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. And they \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w*, and \w set|strong="H7725"\w* him in his \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

And when they arose \w early|strong="H7925"\w* on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, behold, \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w* \add was\add* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* upon his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w* and \w both|strong="H8147"\w* the \w palms|strong="H3709"\w* of his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \add were\add* cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* upon the \w threshold|strong="H4670"\w*; only \add the stump of\add* \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w* was \w left|strong="H7604"\w* to him.\f + \fr 5.4 \ft the stump…: or, the fishy part\f*

Therefore neither the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* of \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w*, nor any that \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into \w Dagon’s|strong="H1712"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* on the \w threshold|strong="H4670"\w* of \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w* in \w Ashdod|strong="H0795"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

But the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w* upon them of \w Ashdod|strong="H0796"\w*, and he \w destroyed|strong="H8074"\w* them, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them with \w emerods|strong="H2914"\w*, \add even\add* \w Ashdod|strong="H0795"\w* and the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* thereof.

And when the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Ashdod|strong="H0795"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that \add it was\add* so, they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall not \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* with us: for his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* is \w sore|strong="H7185"\w* upon us, and upon \w Dagon|strong="H1712"\w* our \w god|strong="H0430"\w*.

They \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* therefore and \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* all the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* unto them, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What shall we \w do|strong="H6213"\w* with the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? And they \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, Let the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* be carried \w about|strong="H5437"\w* unto \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*. And they \w carried|strong="H5437"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w about|strong="H5437"\w* \add thither\add*.

And it was \add so\add*, that, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* they had carried it \w about|strong="H5437"\w*, the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was against the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* with a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w destruction|strong="H4103"\w*: and he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, both \w small|strong="H6996"\w* and \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, and they had \w emerods|strong="H2914"\w* in their secret \w parts|strong="H8368"\w*.

¶ Therefore they \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* to \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*. And it came to pass, as the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Ekron|strong="H6138"\w*, that the \w Ekronites|strong="H6139"\w* cried \w out|strong="H2199"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, They have brought \w about|strong="H5437"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to us, to \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* us and our \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 5.10 \ft us, to…: Heb. me to slay me and my\f*

So they \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* and gathered \w together|strong="H0622"\w* all the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Send \w away|strong="H7971"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and let it go \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to his own \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, that it \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* us not, and our \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: for there was a \w deadly|strong="H4194"\w* \w destruction|strong="H4103"\w* throughout all the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w heavy|strong="H3513"\w* there.\f + \fr 5.11 \ft us not…: Heb. me not, and my\f*

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that \w died|strong="H4191"\w* not were \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* with the \w emerods|strong="H2914"\w*: and the \w cry|strong="H7775"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.
